title: Help Identify this strange looking font.
author: cplea

comments.content:
It's not "Oblisk" but **[Oblique Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161217/http:/haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/oblique-text/)** by Harold Lohner  
Copyright:

> 2000, 2009 Harold Lohner [www.haroldsfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161217/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/ "www.haroldsfonts.com") Inspired by the 1984 analog font OBLIQ from Ellipsis/Letraset
